headline.main: Goebbels Warns Reich of 'Inferno' If She Loses the 'Hard War' Ahead; GOEBBELS PICTURES 'INFERNO' IN DEFEAT

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 6 -- The German people must resign itself to a "hard and relentless" war, and if this war is lost it will face an "inferno beside which all past hardships will pale."
abstract: Warns Germans of hard war ahead, article to be pub in Reich (pub)
snippet: BERLIN, Nov. 6 -- The German people must resign itself to a "hard and relentless" war, and if this war is lost it will face an "inferno beside which all past hardships will pale."...

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
